name: uDraw Studio: Instant Artist
overview: Your blank canvas now comes in HD! uDraw Studio: Instant artist turns your TV into a canvas, sketch pad, and eye-popping display panel as it turns you into a better artist. Follow the tutorials to learn the building blocks of art as you use your uDraw GameTablet to create your own masterpieces right on TV. Every artistic tool you need will be right there on screen whenever you need it. Spice up your picture with special effects, perfect your layout with the Line Tool or Paint Fill, and zoom in to fine-tune your work. Use an SD card to print, save, and share your favorite artistic creations.
